Posted By: Rick McQuillan
Hello, SOLD SOLD
I have for sale or trade 1 1880's Lawsons Game card.  Nice condition except for the stains.  $20 shipped or will trade for 1 T206 or T205 G/VG or better.

Thanks,Rick
